edu.unika.aifb.foam.main
Interface MappingDiscoverySEKT

All Known Implementing Classes:
MappingDiscoverySEKTImpl
public interface MappingDiscoverySEKT

This is the standard interface to discover mappings within the SEKT Mediation workpackage (WP4). It will be part of the general mediation framework.

Author:
Marc Ehrig

Method Detail

initialize

void initialize(java.lang.String classifierFile,
                java.lang.String rulesFile)
Initializes the files required by the alignment algorithm.

Parameters:
classifierFile - the file containing the classification information
rulesFile - the file containing the similarity rules which have to be processed

results

java.util.Set results(java.lang.String fileNameOntology1,
                      java.lang.String fileNameOntology2,
                      java.util.Set mappingObjectsInput)
Determines the mappings based on an alignment algorithm.

Parameters:
fileNameOntology1 - the (temp) file location of the source ontology
fileNameOntology2 - the (temp) file location of the target ontology
mappingObjectsInput - a set of already known mappings (ISimpleMapping)
Returns:
the set of the result mappings (ISimpleMapping), including the confidence value

messages

java.lang.String messages()
Accesses the logged messages during processing.

Returns:
normal and error messages created during the process
